channel.title: Help!plz!im desperate!plz mod or somin help me!
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300]OMJ!!!! OK WAT HAPPENED IS WELL....FIRST OFF LEME SAY THAT IM B1ur (owner of B1urScap3) , typer is just another account i have. IM NOT LYIN I SWEAR ON MY LIFE!!!!ILL TAKE ANY TEST TO PROOV IM B1ur!!!! OK WHAT HAPPENED WAS I TRIED TO CHANGE MY EMAIL ADDRESS ON MY PROFILE (for B1ur) AND I DID IT, BUT WHAT I THINK HAPPENED IS IT WAS THE WRONG EMAIL ADDRESSS!!!!!!! SO NOW WHEN I TRY TO LOG INTO B1ur IT SAYS [/glow]
you cannot log in until your email has been verified. Need another verification email?
[glow=red,2,300][/glow] [glow=red,2,300]SO NOW I CANT LOG IN! AND WHEN I TO LOG ONTO THE EMAIL ADDRESS THE VERIFACATION WAS SUPOSED TO GO TO ITS NOT THERE, CUZ I GAV RONG EMAIL BY ACCIDENT!!!! PLZ CAN A MOD HELP ME!!! I DONT WANA LOOZ THIS ACCOUNT CUZ I CANT MODIFY MY B1urScap3 POST ON THE SERVER ADVERTS!!!! CUZ I MADE MY POST WIT B1ur B1ur :( :eek: :mad: AS I SAID BEFORE I WILL TAKE ANY TEST TO PROOV B1ur IS MINE!!!!!! PLZ UNLOCK HIM OR WATEV!!!!! YOU CAN ASK ANYONE WHO HAS PLAYED ON B1urScap3 TOO. PLZ SOM1 HELP ME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/glow]

item.title: Help!plz!im desperate!plz mod or somin help me!
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

typer:

WAS THE WRONG EMAIL ADDRESSS

Do you remember that E-mail? If you do make that e-mail and when you’ve made it you’ll get the e-mail. If you don’t then resend it.

If your just not getting the e-mail check spam folders & such.

Read full topic
